tha-ap538:4.4: cariyaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ → pasannanayanānanaṃ (bj); pinasampannavekkhaṇaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); pīṇaṃsaṃ paccavekkhanaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap538:15.3: Suppārapaṭṭanavaraṃ → suppārakaṃ paṭṭanavaraṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); suppārapaṭṭanam varaṃ (pts-vp-pli1); suppādapaṭṭanavaraṃ (csp1ed)
tha-ap538:23.2: Sadā jinaṃ passāmi vimalānanaṃ → parājinaṃ passāmi kamalānanaṃ (mr)
tha-ap538:26.2: pācayantaṃ pītākaraṃ → bhājayantaṃ viyāmataṃ (bj); jotayantaṃ idhāmataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); bhājayantaṃ idāmataṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap538:37.3: Gatāyuṃ sukkhakilesaṃ → gatāyusaṃ gataklesaṃ (bj); gatāyusaṃ gataklesañ (pts-vp-pli1); tadāyu saṅkatālesaṃ (mr)
